      • saveQueryParamValue

        protected void saveQueryParamValue(int position,
                                   java.lang.Object obj)
        Saves the parameter value obj for the specified position for use in logging output.
        Parameters:
        position - position (starting at 1) of the parameter to save
        obj - java.lang.Object the parameter value to save
